author: Reuters Editorial
title: Iran's Rouhani says Syria strike to lead to more destruction: Tasnim
text:
ANKARA (Reuters) - Iranian President Hassan Rouhani warned on Saturday that a U.S.-led missile attack on Syria would lead to destruction in the Middle East, the semi-official Tasnim news agency reported.
FILE PHOTO: Iranian President Hassan Rouhani attends a meeting with Muslim leaders and scholars in Hyderabad, India, February 15, 2018. REUTERS/Danish Siddiqui/File Photo “Such attacks will have no result but more destruction ... the Americans want to justify their presence in the region by such attacks,” Rouhani was Quote: d as saying by Tasnim.
Writing by Parisa Hafezi; editing by Jason Neely
